testcase.name: Verify_Order_Place_Process
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @order_place scenario: verify order place process given User on the login page ... passed in 0.5555s when "standard" user enter correct login credentials ... passed in 3.165s then User should be on product page ... passed in 0.01499s e given add "bike" in the cart ... passed in 0.03559s given add "tshirt" in the cart ... passed in 0.04229s when user clicked on cart icon ... passed in 0.08007s when products are visible ... passed in 0.01886s when user clicked on checkout ... passed in 0.02501s when user enter the shipping information ... passed in 3.65s then user should be able to place the order ... passed in 0.05323s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
